allow: Bash(cmd.exe /c "cd /d d:\\Dev\\TVRenamer && gradlew clean build shadowJar createExe --quiet")

Bash(git -C "d:/Dev/TVRenamer" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add clickable "set Hint" link for unfound shows and improve dialog positioning

When a show lookup fails, the Proposed File Path column now shows a
clickable link: No info for "show" â€” click to set Hint. Clicking it
opens Preferences on the Matching tab with the show name pre-filled,
making it easy to add an override without manual navigation.

Supporting changes:
- FileEpisode: add isShowUnfound\(\) accessor; shorten failure text
- ComboField: fix ClassCastException when item data is a Link
- PreferencesDialog: add open\(tabIndex, overrideText\) overload
- DialogPositioning: use parent''s monitor for clamping \(multi-monitor fix\)
- PreferencesDialog: center exactly over parent \(0,0 offset\)
- Help files: document fuzzy matching, recommended indicator, and
  click-to-set-Hint feature
- agents.md: note that build alone does not rebuild fat JAR/EXE

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
